headlines.description: Arsenal maintained their hold on fourth place in the Premier League with a 5-1 win over Bournemouth at the Emirates Stadium on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal beat Bournemouth to stay in top four

headlines.description: Southampton moved out of the relegation zone with a crucial 2-0 home win against struggling Fulham on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton beat Fulham to escape bottom three

headlines.description: Chelsea recovered from their Carabao Cup final woes with a 2-0 win over Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea beat Tottenham with Kepa on bench

headlines.description: Manchester United striker Romelu Lukaku rediscovered his finishing touch in fine fashion, scoring a superb goal in each half  in a 3-1 win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lukaku brace as depleted Man Utd beat Palace

headlines.description: Sadio Mane scored twice -- including a highlight back-heel -- in the first half to give league leaders Liverpool a 4-0 win over Watford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mane's highlight back-heel keeps Liverpool top

events.name: West Ham United at Manchester City

headlines.description: Sergio Aguero's penalty gave Manchester City a 1-0 win over West Ham United as the champions stay a point behind league leaders Liverpool.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City beat West Ham, stay behind Liverpool
